sentence.Network_en: A handsaw is a good thing, but not to shave with.
sentence.Network_cn: 手锯再好也不能用来剃胡须.

sentence.Network_en: Hamlet: I am but mad north - north - west: when the wind is southerly I know a hawk from a handsaw.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈姆雷特: 天上刮西北风的时候,我才发疯; 风从南方吹过来的时候,我不会把一只老鹰当作一只苍蝇.

sentence.Network_en: At the mall, my wife and I picked up some hardware items, including a handsaw.
sentence.Network_cn: 在集市上, 我和妻子买了一些五金用品, 包括一个手锯.
